law.catch_line: Pay rates in the Standard Pay Plan may be set by:...

section.section:
Pay rates in the Standard Pay Plan may be set by:
a series of pay grades and steps within each grade;
fixed rates; or
minimum and maximum amounts.

Pay rates in the Executive Pay Plan may be set by:
a series of executive pay grades and steps within each grade;
fixed rates; or
minimum and maximum amounts.

text.section: A pay rate in either pay plan is subject to any limitations included in the State budget.
